attributes.action: call a General Election now - not next year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The country is in bad shape and cannot afford another year of blunders, gaffs and bloodshed. If the government is so sure it's acting in the country's interests, let's see how true it is.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
